abstract: In addition to JPMorgan results, investors took in the latest report on retail sales, which showed that consumer spending increased 0.4 percent in March.
snippet: In addition to JPMorgan results, investors took in the latest report on retail sales, which showed that consumer spending increased 0.4 percent in March.
lead_paragraph: Indexes edged up on Wednesday after the banking giant JPMorgan Chase posted results that topped expectations and the government reported that retail sales rose for a ninth month.

headline.main: Wall Street Ends Flat, After a Lift From JPMorgan
headline.print_headline: Wall Street Ends Flat, After a Lift From JPMorgan
